select
area.area_name, item.item_name, item.item_class, unit.unit_name,
(ait.quantity - SUM(cit.quantity) ) as no_up_quantity
from area_item ait
LEFT JOIN area_info area on ait.area_code = area.area_code LEFT JOIN ware_info ware on area.ware_code = ware.ware_code left join shelf_info shelf on ait.area_code = shelf.area_code LEFT JOIN cell_info cell on shelf.shelf_code = cell.shelf_code LEFT JOIN mt_alone_cell_item cit on cell.cell_code = cit.cell_code and cit.item_code = ait.item_code LEFT JOIN item_info item on item.item_code = cit.item_code LEFT JOIN unit unit on item.unit_code = unit.unit_code
where 1=1
and ware.company_id = #{companyId}
and ware.ware_code = #{wareCode}
and (item.item_name like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') or item.item_class like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') or area.area_name like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%'))
GROUP BY ait.item_code
ORDER BY ait.area_code
